manifest_name.message: Stream Recorder - download HLS as MP4

manifest_description.message: The most popular downloader for Http Live Streaming(HLS)

action_button_off.message:
Stream Recorder
[ Click to try capturing the video ]

warn_chapter_has_changed.message: The chapter of the stream has changed, but the recording continues.

warn_chunksize_excess.message: The number of fragments in the stream is over NUM_CHUNKS. Please immediately save this video and try recording again, as it may not be able to be processed any further.

warn_discontig_fragments_found.message: Part of the stream is missing, but the recording continues.

error_try_capture.message: Try Capture Mode if necessary.

error_no_index.message: An error occurred while fetching the index file.

error_quality_select.message: An error occurred when checking the video quality.

error_no_downloadable.message: A downloadable video was not found in the index file.

drm_detected.message: The video may be protected by DRM (Digital Rights Management) technologies.

capture_reason_1.message: Do you want to switch to the video capture mode?

capture_reason_2.message:
No video index found.
Do you want to switch to the video capture mode?

capture_reason_3.message: Do you want to use capture mode as before?

refer_troubleshoot.message: Please refer to Troubleshooting in detail.

message_fatal.message: Fatal error. Unfortunately the download cannot be resumed. Please try again.

disableAdblockMessage.message:
Download errors can also be caused by ad-blocker!
Would you please disable your ad-blocker to support us in further developing our service?
